REBECCA.raw_line: Let's go shopping!Hey, new kid.You got Shamus for English?He's the worst. He's a real perv.Where you headed?It's down here... Where are you from?Bummer. How'd you end up in the drop-out school?For having `substances' you're not suppose to have at school.See you later.Hey, you want to come to the beach after school?I just have to graduate, so I can go to F.I.D.M. - Fashion Institute of Design, the Hills girls all went there.Totes...and then have my own line, and fragrance, host a show...Definitely.My mom and her douchey husband are out of town, if you guys want to come over later?I can't wait to get out of here.Yeah, she goes on trips a lot for work...She has a chain of student tutoring centers...Yeah, I know, exemplary student... That's so cute, I love that dress. I love Chanel.I know, right? Are those Prada?Really? Hey, what do your parents do?Oh cool, he's in the `biz'..Nice...oh she's so cute.Yeah, totes...Hey, wanna check some cars?C'mon...Sweet. C'mon. They keep walking and she tries another few cars, until she finds another open door. She looks around and finds some cash and a credit card.Let's go.Yeah, people leave them open with cash and credit cards...Look, we got like 400 bucks...Want a ride?I love that mix you sent me.Wherever we want...Do you know anyone that's out of town?I went into an unlocked house a few weeks ago and found a bunch of cash....where does `Evan' live?How well do you know `Evan'?This it?It's fine, it's fine...don't freak out.What do you think? It's BalenciagaOh, yeah.Get in.I grabbed them on the way out.Hey, call my sister for a bag, will you, she won't sell to me.How long's Evan in Jamaica?Sure.Homie...Oh, you're the best.I love your shirt.Where does she live, can you find her house?Let's go there! Do you think we could find a way in?I bet she'd leave her keys under her mat.They're her pet monkeys. Hi guys.It's fine, it's fine...let's keep going.You're tripping out. This is fine, it's ok, why are you tripping out?C'mon.Yeah, it was sweet, we hung out in her night club room...I got this.We can all go back, we just have to check when she's going out to something...Sweet.Look at these!Alright, alright...in a sec.Oh wait, you have to see her night club room.That's fucked up.I don't know, there's a party at Madison's...I'll let you know, lates.C'mon Teacup.She likes me...and I could probably get like five hundred for her.Yeah, I guess... bye Teacup.Shut the fuck up.Oh my god, I literally love Audrina's style...can you see where she lives? Marc types in her name and a few things, and before you know it he has a photo and map of her house up on the screen.Perfect.Wait. Who are you?Oh. How old are you?C'mon.Can you fit through there?It's fine, it's fine.There's no one outside, calm the fuck down.We're in L.A., there are always helicopters...don't be such a little bitch.I want to get some Victoria Secret model clothes.You guys.I've got a new room at my Dad's in Vegas, I need some stuff to decorate it, I might stay with him a while...here, hold this.I would never do that to you.We never take enough for it to be obvious...and c'mon, it's Paris Hilton.Turn on KTLA.Now.Calm the fuck down, they can't tell who it is.It's fine, it's fine, you can't see who it is.Cool, who's playing?I want to go to Rachel Bilson's, she's in Paris for fashion week.Nothing happened, there's no way you can tell who that is...C'mon, will you find her house for me, please?I want some Chanel...C'mon, you're my best friend, please. Let's go get some stuff.We're going to Rachel Bilson's, wanna come?I don't know.Marc thinks so.C'mon.There aren't, just keep your hat on...and chill out. It's fine.When you have to go, you have to go.Don't freak out, let's go you guys.Everything's cool, c'mon.You guys wait here, I'll get the car.Yo.Yeah.Lates.C'mon, Lindsay's gone, I wanna do this, this is our opportunity.Let's just go, no one's here, you're on camera, but it doesn't matter, you'll be fine, Audrina's was fine...C'mon Marc- pretty please...You're already here. You might as well come up and get something for yourself.Marc, do you like this dress, would this be good on me?Oh my god, this is the dress she wore to the Cosmopolitan opening!I don't know, I'm just going to stay with my dad until things calm down with my mom...I need a change for awhile, I'll call you from there. Will you hold on to some of my stuff for me?Yes.Yes.Yes.My friend Marc was arrested and he * called me from jail and told me the police had done a search warrant at his home.I've been watching TMZ and they've been saying I'm a `person of interest' in these burglaries.No, I wasn't.No.No.No.If I tell you where everything is, would you let me go? Hypothetically let's say I may know where this property is located and who has it, how could that help me?I want to help you out, but I don't want to do anything without talking to my attorney.Yes, I have a prescription for it and bought it in California.Did you speak to any of the victims?Really?! What did Lindsay say? CUT TO:Ok.

NICKI.raw_line: I am a firm believer in Karma, and I think this situation was attracted into my life as a huge learning lesson for me to grow and expand as a spiritual human being. I see myself being like an Angelina Jolie, but even stronger, pushing even harder for the universe and peace and for the health of the planet. I want to lead a huge * charity organization. I want to * lead a country for all I know. *What about you! You were all over that old guy, the manager...We know...Hi, I'm Nicki and this is Sam.Oh my god, Jude Law totally keeps texting me...I think I'm probably going to go meet him later.Bitch, you're just jealous.I did not.Fo' sho!Yeah, totally, she DJs sometimes...No way, I totally want to go to Paris'!Oh my god, no way.What do you think?Leopard and Zebra - seriously?Let's go to Paris', c'mon,I want to rob...I didn't know what they were doing. I thought they were my friends...it all comes back to bad choices, who you have as your friends, and I know the truth will come out.No way!No fucking way.Look at all her Louboutins.Let me see!What do you think? It's Herve Leger.What?!Ew, put that back.Ciao!Keep the glamour alive!This is my little sister, Emily.I like this Rick Owens jacket.Xanax.Look what I found!Her hot bod.How long do we have to do this for?Water delivery.Let's do it.It was alright.And we have a go-see for the BCBG runway show!Oh, yeah, our friend Marc, he's a stylist, he let us borrow some stuff for the auditions.Yeah, his dad has a production company he helps style for.I don't remember.Uh, Mom, we have to get going, we're meeting this manager tonight who could be really helpful.Uh huh.Ew, no.Yeah.Yeah, I mean, do you feel good in that?Totally. I think you look hot. Let me see a different top...Your butt looks awesome.Sexy biatch.J'adore Dior.Oh, yeah.Oh, shit.Hells yeah, text me where...is she still dating Hayden Christensen?I love this one!That was so close!Hi.I know!Look a Mademoiselle bag! How cute is this?!Yeah. It was chill...Yeah, she's in Paris at fashion week. We just went in...Oh my god, that's so cute.What do you think?Oh my god, what's going on!I want a lawyer! Call my lawyer!Mom!Oh my god!Does this look conservative, is this good?Shut Up. *How about this?Oh, Yeah, where are my kitten heels...bitch, you're so fucking lucky you weren't on that video...My mom does a lot of things, she's a minister, she's been a masseuse, she's an energy healer...My dad is a director of photography on T.V. shows, he's been in the industry forever....We've adopted her, we met in ballet class when we were little.Mom, this is my interview. I met her when my parents divorced. Now she lives with us, my mom's home schooled us all for a while.Since I was young I learned about every religion.She had a dysfunctional background, we both did...Can I talk please?! The reason we related so well is my dad is a recovering alcoholic and Sam's mom is..A practicing drug addict and alcoholic and our moms became best friends and...Please! I told you that if you're going to be here you had to be quiet! That's why I didn't want you here because you talk!Yes, we took her in about 6 years ago.Yes, we do a lot of stuff through our church, it's Agape Church.My other sister, Gabby is on a trip with them now helping build homes. And they do a yearly trip to Africa where they build wells and schools for kids.Uh, I can't remember exactly which country... We do bake sales and feeding the homeless, that kind of stuff.I think that I'm a firm... I have a good statement to say.I'm not gonna speak about the case, what I was going to say is that I'm a firm believer in karma and I think this situation was attracted into my life as a huge learning lesson for me to grow and expand as a spiritual human being.I don't think the universe chose a better person than me because from this it's not just affecting me, it's affecting the media and everyone and I think I'm meant to bring truth to all this....I believe that I am an old soul.I do, I think my journey is to be a leader and push for peace and for the health of our planet--It's my main goal. God didn't give me these talents and what I look like to sit around and just be a model or famous. I want to do something people notice, that's why I'm studying business, so I can be a leader and take a stand for people.Can I have a 5 mg adderal.I know, mom.I know right here and right now there is one mind, one power and one presence.Stop!Stop talking.I know I'm always protected and karma cleanses my journey. Thank you Lord, so much for this truth. And so it is.This is a very difficult time for myself and my family. Thank you for respecting my privacy, I look forward to my day in court. She does a flirtatious eye roll and saunters past the cameras in her kitten heels.I could hear her crying the first day, which is hard when you're trying to be strong, I just tried to really keep to myself..., I just tried to get through the day , the days are so long you're woken up atShe got to keep her extensions in, most girls were talking about oh- I had to take my weave out...she was in orange like all of us...Yeah, it was hard for me there were tabloids and on T.V.s in there people were watching the story and they were showing the surveillance video and stuff... and little do people know that when that video came out I was actually in contact with her manager to tell her who I believed the people were who robbed her house... and eventually when I'm able to tell my story people will know the truth.She could've, but you know...yeah...Anyway, you can follow everything about me and my journey at Nickimooreforever dot com.

MARC.raw_line: Thanks.Yeah. Ok, thanks, Mom.Yeah.Oh ok, I'll watch out, thanks. He laughs, grateful to her for bonding.Gym, where's that?Agoura Hills, but I was away for a year, did home school...I got kicked out of the last school for too many absences. What about you?Yeah, sure.Cool, and then intern at Teen Vogue?Yeah, I'd like to have my own lifestyle brand.Is your mom away a lot?For what?And you're at Indian Hills?Yeah, and the shoes are nice...but she needs to get some better extensions...No, Dior.My mom doesn't work, my dad works for a film distribution company, they do a lot of stuff overseas..Yeah...it's cool. I get to go to screenings and stuff.But enough with the patent leather accessories, they look cheap.What's that?No way!That's crazy.Oh, cool, anytime... Where are we going?Okay.Uh, this kid Evan I met online, their family went to Jamaica, why?Woodland hills.We met up a few times...he was pretty hot.Uh huh.Fuck...I think we should get outta here.Uh, Sure.What is it.No way!What the fuck?Where'd you get the keys?Are they sisters?Oh my god, that's Paris Hilton.Yo, bitches.I thought you might want one.Thanks.I loved her, I really did. She was the first person I felt like was my best friend...I loved her almost as a sister, that's what made this situation so hard. CUT TO:Misha Barton got a DUI...Paris Hilton is hosting a party Thursday night at the Cosmopolitan in Vegas...2342 Briar Summit...Looks like you could get in going up the hill behind her house.Oh my fucking god.Let's get the fuck out of here.She's so messy.C'mon, let's get out of here.Oh my fucking god.Her key was under the mat, it was so chill, we just walked in.Lindsay got another D.U.I... Here try this vest with that...Try your hair back.Yeah, that looks classy.Yeah, def, you can't wear zebra and leopard. You have to choose one.We could sell these.Some bad tanner...C'mon let's get the fuck out of here.That sucks...You can't take her dog.Come on Rebecca, leave her dog, it would be too noticeable anyway.Oh shit.We were acting insane, but it all felt so glamorous and wonderful.She's going to Demi & Ashton's Oscar party Sunday.Did you hear that?I think I heard someone.I hear helicopters.Jesus Christ, let's hurry the fuck up.Oh shit, be careful with that thing. Is it loaded?Orlando Bloom's shooting a movie in New York, he's there with Miranda Kerr.What the fuck are you doing?Are you fucking serious?If I ever became not your friend anymore, would you rob me?Oh one second, Mom.Ok, I'll be right there.Hey, Chloe.Did you talk to Ricky about the Rolexes.Can you sell these?Uh...I found them.What do you think, can you take them?Aren't they worth more?Ok, yeah. Thanks.When we went out, we got in everywhere and everyone loved us...and we had so many beautiful, gorgeous things.Bye, Grandma.I think this is like the 5th time.I know, right?Or you could wear the Chloe sandals with this.What?No fucking way, no fucking way.Oh my god.Oh my god.Oh shit.Everything's fine.Yeah, that news thing totally freaked me out.I don't know.What if there are cameras?What are you doing in there?Are you fucking crazy? How are you so relaxed?Oh fuck, someone's here.Oh my fucking god.That was fucked up.I think the biggest problem was after the Audrina thing-nothing happened-it gave Rebecca that self- boost that, oh, this is okay. I can get away with this. And I think her projecting that onto me made me think that it was going to be okay.Rebecca's like biggest conquest was Lindsay Lohan. She was her ultimate fashion icon.I don't think we should do this. If there are cameras, it's gonna be like Audrina's, it's gonna get out.OK, but this is it.I don't know, I think we should get out of here.Yeah, sure.When are you coming back from Vegas?Yeah, sure.I just think she wanted to be part of, like, the lifestyle. Like, the lifestyle that everybody kind of wants.Mom!Yes... They handcuff Marc. The dogs bark, Marc's mom cries.We knew he was out of town through the internet, you'd google his name and see "Orlando Bloom is shooting a movie, he's with Miranda Kerr in New York." We walked in, it was unlocked, there was no alarm.Yeah, I've never even broken a window.We found a safe at the bottom of a closet with the Rolexes and like five thousand dollars...I'll give everything back that I still have, and I'll find a way to repay them, I'm really sorry about what I did.I just thought she was going to stay at her dad's cause she wasn't getting along with her mom and step dad.I thought she was just visiting her dad.I met Rebecca in school after I moved back and went to Indian Hills, I went there because I had a lot of absences. I didn't want to go to school, I had a lot of self- loathing and anxiety issues, I felt that I was ugly...I know I'm not ugly, but I never thought I was an A-list looking guy.I Went to Indian Hills to learn and be with my peers, I felt so self-conscious I didn't look as good as everyone else.On my Facebook page recently I had 800 friends requests, I accepted them all, I didn't even look at them, then I noticed someone had created a fan page for me. If it had been for something I had done to help the community or benefit something I'd love it, but it's just kind of awkward for me that these people are loving me for something that's looked down on in society... It's kinda showing that America has some sick fascination with a Bonnie and Clyde kind of thing.
